organic_tips: Maintain a healthy soil microbiome with organic matter additions like compost and manure.

Apply compost or manure to increase organic matter and improve nitrogen availability.
Incorporate phosphorus-rich organic materials like bone meal, rock phosphate, or composted manure.

organic_practices.name: Cover Cropping
organic_practices.implementation: Planting non-cash crops to protect and enrich the soil.
organic_practices.benefits: Improved soil structure, increased organic matter, and reduced erosion

organic_practices.name: No-Till Farming
organic_practices.implementation: Minimizing soil disturbance through direct seeding.
organic_practices.benefits: Improved soil health, reduced erosion, and increased soil carbon sequestration

organic_practices.name: Crop Rotation
organic_practices.implementation: Alternating different crops each growing season.
organic_practices.benefits: Improved soil fertility, reduced pest and disease pressure, and increased biodiversity
